other_tests.findings: Tumor in the lower part of the stomach.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Tumor removed; postoperatively clear of any observed malignancies for 3 years.
Follow-up in January 2002 showed a decrease in previous metastases and no new lesions.

other_tests.findings: Raised suspicions about metastatic disease; showed three visible tumors.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Demonstrated new metastases to the liver after progressive weight loss and refused hospitalization.
